explains: adj. 崭新的，未用过的；最近获得的

sentences.en: Yesterday he went off to buy himself a brand-new car.
sentences.cn: 昨天他去给自己买了一辆崭新的车。

sentences.en: He paid his licence fee, and walked out with a brand-new driving licence.
sentences.cn: 他付了驾照费用，拿着一张全新的驾照走出来。

sentences.en: This is a brand-new salvo in the war against encryption.
sentences.cn: 这是反加密战争中一场全新的奇袭。
